producing over 50 PS of 90 kg per acre some of the recommended varieties include Pioneer v253 Pioneer v g90 h64 h628 h 629 it is crucial to plant these varieties during the long range season for the typically yield an average of 25 to 35 90 kg bags per acre and matures within 75 to 90 days after getting it right on the best mze varieties then how well do you plant this seeds before planting ensure the land is clear of food farmers can either weed manually or you can use n selective herbicides such as CA or Roundup a recommended plant is spacing of 60 cm by 30 cm compared to the supports rapid root growth NPK 23230 should be top on after sewing or C fertilizer should be applied 55 days after sewing to enhance seed formation and with game after planting you need to control the
